title: 학술 글쓰기 논증 및 증명
intent: 학술 글쓰기에서 논리적 논증을 구성하고 주장을 체계적으로 증명한다.
lexset: argument, evidence, proof, demonstrate, substantiate, validate, justify, reasoning, logic, premise

seeds.en: The core of the argument lies in empirical evidence.
We reached the conclusion through logical reasoning.
The argument should be verified from multiple perspectives.
We have considered potentially refutable points in advance.
We prove the hypothesis through systematic demonstration.
Logical consistency ensures the credibility of the argument.
Various pieces of evidence support the same conclusion.
We logically derived the conclusion from the premises.
We strengthened the argument through critical review.
The theoretical foundation supports the validity of the argument.
